findings.title: No Check on Constructor for Max Supply Limit
findings.description: In the constructor of GazeCoin.sol contract, there is a mint function that mints 100000000 tokens to the owner of the contract without checking if it exceeds the maximum supply limit.

findings.title: Unlocked pragma (pragma solidity ^0.8.9)
findings.description: The compiler version is not fixed, which can lead to unexpected behavior and security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: No Check in Constructor for Max Supply
findings.description: In the constructor of GazeCoin.sol contract, there is a mint function that mints 100000000 tokens to the owner of the contract without checking if it exceeds the maximum supply limit.
